name: Snake 2D (Actionware)
description:
Snake, who has'nt played it in their youth! Since it whas one of the fist games I played as a child on my Nokia 3310, its whas an obvious choice to make my first ever game a Snake game.

Hopefully it can awaken some nostalgia for you as well! 

How to play

Use the arrow keys to move up/down/left/right. 

There is a mute button op the top right for if you find the sound effects annoying.
